alert.note: Alert for Wasatch Back; Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs; Western Uinta Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued May 18 at 11:01AM MDT until further notice by NWS Saltlake
info.description: .Warm temperatures may melt snowpack and increase river flows. ...FLOOD WATCH FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by snowmelt continues to be possible. * WHERE...A portion of Utah, including the following areas, Wasatch Plateau/Book Cliffs, Wasatch Back and Western Uinta Mountains. * WHEN...Through Friday morning. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of Daniel`s Creek, particularly in the town of Charleston adjacent to the creek and SR-113 where it crosses the creek. The creek and its tributaries may rise out of their banks, especially with any moderate to heavy rainfall that is expected in the area over the next few days. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.

area.areaDesc: Wasatch Back; Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs; Western Uinta Mountains
